name: HostCallbackInfo
desc: The time- and transport-related callback functions for an audio unit.

items.name: init(hostUserData: UnsafeMutableRawPointer?, beatAndTempoProc: HostCallback_GetBeatAndTempo?, musicalTimeLocationProc: HostCallback_GetMusicalTimeLocation?, transportStateProc: HostCallback_GetTransportState?, transportStateProc2: HostCallback_GetTransportState2?)
var beatAndTempoProc: HostCallback_GetBeatAndTempo?
items.desc: Your callback function that provides beat and tempo information to an audio unit. May be NULL.

items.name: var hostUserData: UnsafeMutableRawPointer?
items.desc: Custom data specified by your application. May be NULL.

items.name: var musicalTimeLocationProc: HostCallback_GetMusicalTimeLocation?
items.desc: Your callback function that provides musical timeline information to an audio unit. May be NULL.

items.name: var transportStateProc: HostCallback_GetTransportState?
items.desc: Your callback function that provides audio transport state information (play, rewind, and so on) to an audio unit. May be NULL.
